about_the_game:
This Septerra Core - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into an unique game universe. The Septerra Core Digital Deluxe Content includes a 36-pages Digital Artbook, Full-HD Wallpaper, Maps, Avatars, Walkthroughs and Cheats.

CONTENT:


  • 36-pages Digital Artbook (PDF Format)
  • 6 Full-HD and 2.8K Wallpaper
  • Magic Cards
  • Avatars
  • Maps (Spoiler-Alert!)
  • Walkthroughs and Cheats [Englisch and German]
detailed_description:
This Septerra Core - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into an unique game universe. The Septerra Core Digital Deluxe Content includes a 36-pages Digital Artbook, Full-HD Wallpaper, Maps, Avatars, Walkthroughs and Cheats.

CONTENT:


  • 36-pages Digital Artbook (PDF Format)
  • 6 Full-HD and 2.8K Wallpaper
  • Magic Cards
  • Avatars
  • Maps (Spoiler-Alert!)
  • Walkthroughs and Cheats [Englisch and German]

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a

  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a

  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU @ 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible @ 64 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
